home.title: Michele Scarpa
home.heading: Hi, I'm Michele Scarpa!
home.description: I am a fullstack software engineer, primarily focused on web development. I'm passionate about building robust and scalable applications, with extensive expertise across frontend and backend frameworks and ecosystems
home.description2: I am a software engineer, primarily focused on web development. I'm passionate about software development and I have extensive expertise in various technologies, including JS, TS, Java, Angular, React, and Spring. Throughout my career, I have also worked on projects involving Digital Signage (Smart TVs - Tizen ) and mobile android applications
home.event-description: I'm also a speaker. Here you can find the conferences where I participated as a speaker.
home.projects-descriptions: Here youâ€™ll find an overview of my work: projects from my job, personal initiatives, and collaborative experiments.

project.title: From Code to Creation
project.intro: Explore the projects I've brought to life, combining creativity and technical expertise to transform ideas into reality.

resume.privacy: I hereby authorize the use of my personal data in accordance to the GDPR 679/16 - "European regulation on the protection of personal data".

blog.title: Thoughts in Code and Beyond
blog.intro: An archive of my insights, discoveries, and journey through the world of programming and more.

event.title: Tech Contamination
event.intro: From code to stage: my commitment to sharing important topics and fostering discussion within the developer community. Thanks to the BacaroTech project, I've become a speaker, and I aim to bring some topics important to me live to audiences. Being able to program is crucial for a developer; being able to talk about how to program is a further step towards greater awareness.
